name.ja: <ruby>冥<rt>めい</rt></ruby><ruby>跡<rt>せき</rt></ruby><ruby>神<rt>しん</rt></ruby>イシリア

summoning_condition.en: This card cannot be Special Summoned, except by the effect of "Monumenthes Festival -The Isyria Seance-".

effect.en: This card cannot be destroyed by card effects. When you Normal or Special Summon a Beast-Warrior Type monster face-up, your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards. During your turn, other face-up EARTH Attribute Beast-Warrior Type monsters on your field gain 3000 ATK and inflict piercing battle damage.
